Text:

Thanks again.

BabiesDontNeedSpleens, thanks my friend. By the way, if anyone has BRILLIANT #5 from Marvel/Icon (supposedly it came out in December) or SPACE: 1999 - AWE #2 from Archaia, I'd really like to have those!
i was wondering do you have bad planet or bullet points? no one is seeding anymore on the links posted thanks for all the work you do

elmacho74, you're welcome. but bad planet is seeded & healthy http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/4591338/Bad_Planet_-_Steve_Niles__%5Balieneye%5D_%5Bh33t%5D  i just downloaded the set, it only took about 8 minutes.

Had to get this as Doom is awesome!

BTW will you take a request?  I am looking for the 3 issue mini from 1999 "Dr Mid-Nite" either TPB or the 3 comics is fine?  hope you can help me find this STFmaryville
Thanks have been trying for days but it stays at 0%. any recommendations on how i can get it to download i am using torch torrent. thanks for the help

cheers
STF, thank you for this, and everybody else- thank you for the civil discourse. 11 comments on a TPB torrent, in a row, 100% human decency. Hope for humanity restored. Carry on.

scienceho, thanks! i personally think Comics is the best area on TPB -- lots of great people here.

BabiesDontNeedSpleens, thank you for the info. my info had come from the official marvel site, which i now assume just hasn't been updated since bendis & bagley blew another deadline. the reason i was anxious to get #5 was that the official marvel site also says #6 comes out today. LOL! not gonna happen. thanks my friend.

elmacho74, i use uTorrent 3.2.3 and i'm not exaggerating, that torrent came to me from 0 to 100% is under 10 minutes. i was very surprised since you had stated it wasn't seeded. i'll re-up it for you today though. it's not a big deal. i also have bullet points ...

Mothra67, i can surely u/l that for you. i also have some golden age books to put up on here, since i know you love 'em. hopefully there are some issues you don't have.
oblivious2000, here's the last of the comics you asked about: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8198524/BLACK_WIDOW_01-03_%281999%29_plus_WEB_OF_INTRIGUE_one-shot_REQUESTED

thank you. i will try Utorrent i appreciate the help. thanks for bullet points downloaded in less then 5 minutes.

Since you seem to be taking requests on this post STF, I was wondering if you have Lone Wolf 2100, I got stuck at 96% for a week.
Also I would love good scans of Grant Morrison's Marvel Boy series.
If you can help out great, if not no worries. 
Thanks for all your hard work in the meantime.

elmacho74, no problem. i've got the bad planet torrent almost ready to go, but i'm trying to download something extra to throw in.  :-)

321loh, i can probably dig those up. however, it's new comics day and they are starting to show up now, so check back in a day or two.
YOU ARE MFing AWESOME! Im the original requester! I didnt think I would ever get these!!  THANK YOU!!
Thanks man, great upload. Anyone know if someone has uploaded Dr. Strange and Dr. Doom: Triumph and Torment? I've been looking for that for some time..
